data.md:MetaData: Pass-through measurements of magnetic susceptibility from IODP Hole 324-U1347A
29 cores, 246.5 m cored, 47.1 % average recovery, 157.6 m (CSF-A) Igneous basement depth, 159.9 m Igneous basement cored, 64.2 % Average basement recovery
Proceedings of the Integrated Ocean Drilling Program
